dublin_core.dcvalue: The ENN project was able to develop internet based applications for sleep medicine and prototypes of multimedia tutorials for headache epilepsy and headache Telematic technologies were used throughout all workpackages of the European Neurological Network This overview presents the conceptual links between expert systems the multimedia database CD ROM based tutorials and software tools in order to support neurological diagnostic and therapeutic practice in sleep headache and epilepsy
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T12:15:58Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2001-01-09
Studies in health technology and informatics
